message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you say?
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more
I'm not sure I'm willing to give up 30% of the reduced value. I'll try to do better next round.
I'm taking a firmer stance this time, Bob. Meet me at 85% or we'll keep negotiating.
I'm not willing to give up that much, but I'm willing to compromise again
I'm not happy with the 25% offer, Bob. I think I can do better than that. Let's keep negotiating.
I'm taking a tough stance, Bob. Meet me at 90% or we'll keep negotiating. Time is running out!
I'm getting desperate, but I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal
I'm not sure I'm willing to accept 40% of the reduced value, Bob. I think I can do better than that. Let's keep negotiating.
I'm taking a huge risk, Bob. I'm offering you a tiny share. Accept or walk away, but I'm not budging.
I'm not going to get any more desperate, I'm going to make a fair offer
I'll accept a 50-50 split, Bob. It's a fair deal given the circumstances.
